screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .paperlibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: PAPERLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Painter is an application digital artists use for composing realistic paintings and editing photos. It provides various tools, including paintbrushes, shapes, and image effects. The app also allows you to apply paper textures (included in PAPERLIBRARY files) onto tools, like brushes, to adjust their appearance.
You can view a library of paper textures through the "Papers" panel in Painter. To access the papers, select Window → Media Panels → Papers .
NOTE: Corel replaced the .PAPERS format with the PAPERLIBRARY format.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .paperlibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
images.caption: PAPERLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023
